description: 'False' or 'No' means that this form cannot be reassigned to a different team. Defaults to Yes.
name: Allow Reassignment

description: The teams to which this form can be assigned. If not set, it can be assigned to all teams.
name: Assignable Teams

description: Dictates if the App should present an assignment selector before displaying a form
name: Assignment Type

description: If the form has custom submission workflow for a given event, the name of the event (i.e. Created, Saved, Submitted...etc) should be listed as one of the attribute values
name: Custom Submission Workflow

description: The Discussion Id related to this form
name: Discussion Id

description: Notification template used when a submission has been completed.
name: Notification Template Name - Complete

description: Notification to send when tasks are created for this form
name: Notification Template Name - Create

description: The Team that can access this service from Queue
name: Owning Team

description: A comma separated list of subtasks that are allowed to be 'attached' to this work order / subtask. If this attribute is blank or missing, all subtasks are allowed.
name: Permitted Subtasks

description: 'True' or 'Yes' means that work orders / subtasks of this type are not allowed to have related items; the 'Add' button will not be visible / enabled.
name: Prohibit Subtasks
